List Volume Metadata.

Source: R/list_volume_metadata.R
list_volume_metadata.Rd

This function has been deprecated and may be removed in a future release. See get_volume_by_id() and other list_volume_* functions for related functionality.

list_volume_metadata(vol_id = 1, vb = FALSE)

Arguments

vol_id

Selected volume number.

vb

A Boolean value. If TRUE provides verbose output.

Value

A data frame with metadata about a volume.

Examples

# \donttest{
list_volume_metadata() # List info about volume 1.
#> 
Downloading: 4.1 kB     
Downloading: 4.1 kB     
Downloading: 4.1 kB     
Downloading: 4.1 kB     
#>   vol_id                                     name
#> 1      1 Databrary sponsored workshops and events
#>                                                     owners permission
#> 1 Adolph, Karen; Gilmore, Rick O.; Staff; Admin, Databrary          1
#>                               doi
#> 1 https://doi.org/10.17910/B7159Q
# }
